text: Władysław Ziółek (born 22 June 1935) is a Polish Roman Catholic priest who served as the Archbishop of Łódź from 1986 to 2012. He is currently the Archbishop Emeritus of Łódź. == Early life and education == Władysław Ziółek was born in Komorniki, Poland. He was ordained a priest on 13 July 1958 by Bishop Józef Gawlina. == Ecclesiastical career == He was appointed an auxiliary bishop of Łódź in 1980 and consecrated by Bishop Józef Rozwadowski. In 1986, he was named the Archbishop of Łódź, a position he held until his retirement in 2012. He was succeeded by Marek Jędraszewski. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the Archdiocese of Łódź Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Łódź
title: Władysław Ziółek
